author: kkolinko
msg: Correct some lines in the French translation, modified in r894586

author: jeremias
msg: Fixed a multi-threading bugfix, visible for example when opening examples/fo/basic/readme.fo with the AWT Preview. Words could be jumbled and the wrong fonts were sometimes used.
The class still has a performance problem concerning the use of the TextLayout class for determining some font metrics otherwise not available from the Java2D/AWT subsystem.
